item.description: [...] Edit #2: Patience is already collecting known issues with the new patch. Whooo! Thanks to Foton for the link, although I disagree with his contention that the patch notes contain no character development! [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Edit #2: Patience is already collecting known issues with the new patch. Whooo! Thanks to Foton for the link, although I disagree with his contention that the patch notes contain no character development! […]

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: <blockquote>And there is NO character development whatsoever.</blockquote> Ha. I can tell you didn't get to the troll letters on page three, nor the poor elves with their hair loss treatments and toupees. Moving stuff, that!
item.content:encoded:
And there is NO character development whatsoever.

Ha. I can tell you didn’t get to the troll letters on page three, nor the poor elves with their hair loss treatments and toupees. Moving stuff, that!
